title: TB10: Write integration test for complete flow (TDD)
description: WRITE TEST FIRST: End-to-end test that simulates GitHub webhook ‚Üí LinkedIn post. Use real test repo. Mock external APIs OR use real APIs with test mode. Test should verify entire pipeline. Test FAILS initially because orchestration does not exist yet.
notes:
TDD RED PHASE COMPLETE - Integration Tests Written

Test Files Created:
1. tests/integration_test.go (299 lines)
2. tests/testdata/commit_webhook.json (test fixture)

Integration Tests (3 total):

1. TestEndToEndWebhookToLinkedIn - Main E2E test
   Flow tested:
   - GitHub webhook received with valid signature
   - Commit data extracted from payload
   - Commit summarized using AI (ChatGPT)
   - Professional image generated (DALL-E)
   - LinkedIn post created with text and image
   - Post text contains relevant commit keywords
   - Image file exists and is valid
   
   Assertions:
   - HTTP 200 response for webhook
   - At least one LinkedIn post created
   - Post text is non-empty
   - Post mentions database/performance/optimization keywords
   - Image path is non-empty
   - Image file exists on filesystem

2. TestEndToEndWithMultipleCommits - Multi-commit handling
   Tests webhook with multiple commits
   - Verifies first commit is selected (most recent)
   - Validates post content matches first commit topic
   - Ensures proper commit prioritization

3. TestEndToEndHandlesAPIErrors - Error resilience
   Tests graceful degradation when APIs fail
   - Webhook accepted (200/202) even if processing fails
   - No crashes or panics
   - Error handling prevents post creation on failure

Test Infrastructure:
- MockLinkedInTracker: Tracks posts created during tests
- loadTestWebhook(): Loads JSON fixtures from testdata/
- generateHMAC(): Creates GitHub webhook signatures
- setupTestOrchestrator(): Creates test orchestrator (stub)
- setupTestOrchestratorWithErrors(): Simulates API failures
- teardownTestOrchestrator(): Cleans up temp files

Test Fixture:
commit_webhook.json contains realistic GitHub webhook payload:
- Repository: test/roxas-integration-test
- Commit: Database query optimization with performance improvements
- Author: Test Developer
- Message includes business impact (40% improvement)

Test Results:
FAIL - 2/3 tests failing (EXPECTED for RED phase)

‚úó TestEndToEndWebhookToLinkedIn (3s timeout)
  Error: "Expected at least one LinkedIn post to be created"
  Reason: TestOrchestrator.HandleWebhook() is a stub

‚úó TestEndToEndWithMultipleCommits (2s timeout)
  Error: "Expected at least one LinkedIn post"
  Reason: TestOrchestrator.HandleWebhook() is a stub

‚úì TestEndToEndHandlesAPIErrors (2s)
  Passes: Accepts webhook despite errors

Missing Implementation (TB11):
- TestOrchestrator.HandleWebhook() method
- Full pipeline orchestration:
  1. Validate webhook signature
  2. Extract commit from payload
  3. Call summarizer service
  4. Call image generator service
  5. Call LinkedIn poster service
  6. Track result in MockLinkedInTracker

Ready for TB11 GREEN phase implementation.
